attributes.action: let tul bahadar pun move to the uk, because he served this country for twenty years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: tul bahadar pun served with the gurkha's for twenty years and how we have tossed him to one side saying he can not show that he has strong enough ties the this country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
